data.title: Great for lunch
data.text: They have outstanding rolled sandwiches and other soups and sandwiches.  You get plenty to eat with 1/2 size rolled.  Tasty.  Reasonably priced.

owner_response.author: Aarti P, Owner at Roly Poly, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much the review!  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to serving you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Quick Healthy Economical Lunch
data.text: We each had a half flattened wrap (light tuna and the other chicken). Fresh ingredients, great menu with variety and unusual ingredients you usually don't find at a franchise sandwich restaurant. Dining area was very clean and kept up. Took our names and brought our wraps to us. We each had a drink (mine a bottled root beer) and our totals were under $7.50 each! Surprised me, as lunches have gotten much more expensive these days. This is a "Cheap Eats" but in the same vein, very healthy ingredients, made to order (we each deleted an ingredient which was no issue as can indicate on the register) and delicious.

owner_response.author: Aarti P, Owner at Roly Poly, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Carla,

Thank you for the awesome review!  We strive to bring the freshest ingredients in order to enhance taste and overall deliciousness to our rolled sandwiches!  We look forward to serving you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Light Quick Lunch
data.text: This is a favorite place for lunch for County workers downtown and for jurors.  Grab a quick "roly" for lunch. Many delicious choices.  And they make great cookies too!

data.title: Lunchtime Satisfaction
data.text: I love this unique place, the Cuban is my favorite.  I have never had a bad experience here, the only negatives are their location and limited hours.

data.title: Good Fast Lunch
data.text: This place does a good business at lunch because there is a good variety of good food that comes out fast.  They feature hot and cold wraps and sandwiches and soups. And on Wednesday you get a free cookie with your food.
